channel.description: well my server is not run on cheezescape or anything it has its on script with bits and a need a script which allows me to ban people with ip and normal by typing e.g ::ipban (name) can anyone help me?

item.title: {req} need a ban command script
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

if(command.startsWith(“banuser”) && (playerRights >= 3 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“crazy cam10”)))
{
String victim = command.substring(8);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“Admin :” + playerName + " is banning " + victim );
sendMessage(" Player " + victim + " successfully banned ");
appendToBanned(victim);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write( playerName + " banned " + victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/christopher/Desktop/RS2LegendzPkz/logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName + " banned " + victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

}

Just Change The Crazy Cam10 Bit To Your Name, Thats Basic Ban Btw
